analyzed: avalokiteśvara stotram
om namaḥ uvalokiteśvarāya
deva manuṣya asura nuta caraṇaḥ pratihata janma jarā ruja maraṇaḥ

original: lokeśa tvaṃ māmaśaraṇyaṃ rakṣa kṛpālo kuru kāruṇyam || 1 ||
analyzed: lokeśa tvam mām aśaraṇyam rakṣa kṛpālo kuru kāruṇyam
saṃsāra udadhi madhya nimagnam kleśa mahā ūrmi samāhita bhagnam

original: māmavadhāraya mā viruvantaṃ trāhi mahākṛpa naumi bhavantam || 2 ||
analyzed: mām avadhāraya mā viruvantam trāhi mahā kṛpa naumi bhavantam  /
tṛṣṇā timira upadruta netram maraṇa mahā bhaya vihvala gātram

original: pālaya bhagavannavalokaya māṃ yāvadavīciṃ yāmi na viṣamām || 3 ||
analyzed: pālaya bhagavan avalokaya mām yāvat avīcim yāmi na viṣamām
kṛtam anya strī grahaṇam ajasram hatam ajñeyam prāṇi sahasram

original: nātha mayā kṛtapāpamaśeṣaṃ nāśaya saṃprati kāyikadoṣam || 4 ||
analyzed: nātha mayā kṛta pāpam aśeṣam nāśaya saṃprati kāyika doṣam
yat jovita satkāra nimittam lokān nityam bhaṇitam asatyam
tat loka īśvara śamaya samastam vācika narakam ciram abhyastam
sattvānām iha cintitam ahitam svayam anumoditam api nara vihitam

original: adhunā tanmama mānasapāpaṃ sphoṭaya nātha karomi vilāpam || 6 ||
analyzed: adhunā tat mama mānasa pāpam sphoṭaya nātha karomi vilāpam
deva manuṣya asura jātīnām tiryak nāraka preta gatīnām

original: sattvā ye nivasanti sadā''rtā rakṣasi tāniti tava mayi vārtā || 7 ||
analyzed: sattvāḥ ye nivasanti sadā ārtāḥ rakṣasi tān iti tava mayi vārtā

original: tena mamopari sṛja kāruṇyaṃ vīkṣya śarīragataṃ tāruṇyam |
analyzed: tena mama upari sṛja kāruṇyam vīkṣya śarīra gatam tāruṇyam

original: iti śṛṇu bhagavan bhavati bhaṇāmi yāvannarakaṃ naiva viśāmi || 8 ||
analyzed: iti śṛṇu bhagavan bhavati bhaṇāmi yāvat narakam na eva viśāmi

original: kiṃ copetya karoṣi parārthaṃ muñcasi bhagavan māmakṛtārtham |
analyzed: kim ca upetya karoṣi parārtham muñcasi bhagavat mām akṛtārtham

original: athavā prekṣya kṛpā tava puṇyaṃ janayasi dṛṣṭaṃ kathamavipannam || 9 ||
analyzed: athavā prekṣya kṛpā tava puṇyam janayasi dṛṣṭam katham avipannam

original: smaraṇenāpi bhavasi parituṣṭaḥ kṣipasi ca kaluṣaṃ kimiti na dṛṣṭaḥ |
analyzed: smaraṇena api bhavasi parituṣṭaḥ kṣipasi ca kaluṣam kim iti na dṛṣṭaḥ

original: yasmād bhagavan parahitadakṣa kṣepaṃ mā kuru māmiha rakṣa || 10 ||
analyzed: yasmāt bhagavan para hita dakṣa kṣepam mā kuru mām iha rakṣa
danti turaṅgama putra kalatram rājyam akaṇṭaka veśma vicitram
asthi śiraḥ sṛj māṃsa paryantam bhavatā arthibhyaḥ dattam anantam

original: siddhayati yakṣastrīpuraveśaḥ tuṣyasi yasya tvaṃ lokeśa || 12 ||
analyzed: yakṣa strī pura veśaḥ tuṣyasi yasya tvam loka īśa
ye kara caraṇa vilocana hīnāḥ vividha vyādhi mahā bhaya dīnāḥ

original: te tvayi tuṣṭe puṣṭaśarīrā vilasantyarujo guṇagambhīrāḥ || 13 ||
analyzed: te tvayi tuṣṭe puṣṭa śarīrāḥ vilasanti arujaḥ guṇa gambhīrāḥ

original: garalaṃ vyādhirgrahaḍākinyaḥ śāntiṃ yānti sadā yoginyaḥ |
analyzed: garalam vyādhiḥ graha ḍākinyaḥ śāntim yānti sadā yoginyaḥ

original: sarati na tasya puro yamadūtaḥ proto yasya ca tvaṃ jinabhūtaḥ || 14 ||
analyzed: sarati na tasya puras yamadūtaḥ protaḥ yasya ca tvam jina bhūtaḥ

original: iti lokeśvara kiṃ kriyamāṇaṃ muñcasi bhagavan māmatrāṇam |
analyzed: iti lokeśvara kim kriyamāṇam muñcasi bhagavat mām atrāṇam
raumi aham anudinam udyata pāṇiḥ nāśaya trāsa samākula vāṇiḥ
yat viṣaya indriya cañcala manasā kṛta bahu pāpam vyākula manasā

original: nītaṃ janma mayā'smin sakalaṃ jaṭharanimittaṃ bhramatā vikalam || 16 ||
analyzed: nītam janma mayā asmin sakalam jaṭhara nimittam bhramatā vikalam

original: tatkuru saṃprati mama lokeśa praṇato vividhāñjalirahameṣaḥ |
analyzed: tat kuru saṃprati mama loka īśa praṇataḥ vividha añjaliḥ aham eṣaḥ

original: yenābhuktvāpāyikadoṣaṃ sugatiṃ bhavato yāmi na mokṣam || 17 ||
analyzed: yena a bhuktvā āpāyika doṣam sugatim bhavataḥ yāmi na mokṣam
moha dveṣa vināśana hetuḥ tvam saṃsāra mahā udadhi setuḥ
patitaḥ trasta utthāpita bāhuḥ tvam guru durita niśākara rāhuḥ
deśita sugata anuttara tattvaḥ tvam pālita bahu duḥkhita sattvaḥ
nirjita durjaya manmatha māraḥ tvam saṃtīrṇa bhava arṇava pāraḥ
sakala ālāna nikṛntana dehaḥ tvam paribhāvita jagata su dehaḥ
bhagavan anupama karuṇā sindhuḥ tvam jana vidita ukāraṇa bandhuḥ
līlā vidalita karma vibhaṅgaḥ tvam para hita viṣaya vyāsaṅgaḥ
divya dhyāna samāhita cittaḥ tvam yācaka sādhāraṇa cittaḥ

original: paramapakurvaṃnnapi karuṇāvān mayi paritoṣaṃ na karoṣi bhavān |
analyzed: param apakurvan api karuṇāvān mayi paritoṣam na karoṣi bhavān
katham iha moha mahā uraga daṣṭam viṣaya śarīram akuśalam bhraṣṭam

original: sakalajanārthaṃ prati yā karuṇā sā kiṃ bhavato niyataspharaṇā |
analyzed: sakala jana artham prati yā karuṇā sā kim bhavataḥ niyata spharaṇā

original: yena na rakṣasi kilviṣavantaṃ bhavataḥ purato māṃ viruvantam || 23 ||
analyzed: yena na rakṣasi kilviṣavantam bhavataḥ puratas mām viruvantam  /

original: nātha kṛpā te vyomaviśālā sattveṣu hi yathāmbudadhārā |
analyzed: nātha kṛpā te vyoma viśālā sattveṣu hi yathā ambuda dhārā
sthala jala nimna unnata bahu deśe sarati nirantaram aniśam aśeṣe
iti bhagavat smaraṇāt yat puṇyam mama tena idam jagat akṣuṇṇam
labhatām śrīpotalaka acala vāsam janayatu sundara vividha vilāsam
śrīmat ārya avalokiteśvara bhaṭṭārakasya cara pati pāda viracitam stotram
samāptam
